mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_NAME, BIRTHDATE, GENDER, MARITAL_STATUS, LEVEL_NAME, DEPARTMENT_NAME, JOIN_DATE, POSITION_NAME, EMAIL, PHONE FROM EMPLOYEE AS Emp INNER JOIN JAPANESE_LEVEL AS Jap ON Emp.LEVEL_ID = Jap.LEVEL_ID INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT AS Dep ON Emp.DEPARTMENT_ID = Dep.DEPARTMENT_ID INNER JOIN POSITION AS Pos ON Emp.POSITION_ID = Pos.POSITION_ID where employee_id = #{employeeId} OR employee_name = #{employeeName} ;
